task_text: [Public Health Policy][Summarization] Summarize the policy recommendations from the ACP COVID-19 vaccination paper regarding vaccine-allocation priorities.

gold_end_state.summary: The ACP paper recommends prioritizing vaccination for populations at highest risk of severe disease and exposure (healthcare workers, elderly, and high-risk comorbid groups), integrating equity considerations, and balancing rapid population coverage with ensuring full-course immunization where evidence supports it.
